item.serp:button_a.name: Button A
serp.intro1: Hello There! Welcome to the world of Pokémon!
serp.intro2: This world is inhabited by creatures called Pokémon!
serp.intro3: For some people, Pokémon are pets. Others use them for fights
serp.intro4: Now, let's see, your name is
serp.intro5: I'll give you your starter Pokémon along with a starter kit
serp.intro6: Many adventures with the Pokémon await you!
serp.intro7: This addon was made by Zacek el Serpentín
joy.1: Welcome to the Pokémon Center!  here you and your Pokémon can rest until they recover!
joy.2: You can heal your defeated Pokémon with the machine next to me, it's free!
joy.3: As you travel you can find other Pokémon Centers just like this one, don't worry if you go too far!
joy.4: In each Pokémon Center there will be a nurse just like me, don't be scared, we are family uWu
joy.5: If you don't have a Pokémon Center nearby you can make your own healing machine!
jenny.1: Lost and found section, do you recognize any?
jenny.2: Here, looks like this belongs to you!
jenny.3: Oops... I'm afraid this item doesn't belong to you.  See you soon!
jenny.4: Thank you for your collaboration!  When the owner of this object comes for it, we will deliver it to him!
prof.1: Studying Pokémon is exhausting work... But fascinating!
prof.2: How many Pokemon have you caught today?
prof.3: Every so often a different Professor will come to take my place, but until then I'll keep working!
prof.4: Don't forget that if you need to rest, you can go to any Pokémon center!
prof.5: Our research will progress much faster thanks to your help!
store.bike: Let's see... C'mon! A Bike Pass? Here you have, enjoy it!
store.ride: This is... A Ride Pass?? Here you have, take care!
communicator.on: Welcome to the Rotom-Communicator!  Crouch and interact to switch contacts.
trainer.mission: Hello! This happens, I need a wish star, a key stone or a Rare Candy Bowl. If you help me I'll give you something I have in my backpack!
trainer.thanks: Thank you very much!  Here is your reward.
prof.mission: Greetings! Do you need me to inspect something?
prof.mega: Ohh, a Key stone! Okay, this device will help you properly use your energy. it's called Mega Ring!
prof.dynamax: This is... a wish star?!  incredible! With this device you will be able to release the Dynamax energy of your Pokémon, it is called Dynamax Band!
prof.egg: A bad Egg... Even though it's bad, I can still get it back. Take! Take it to the Personal Laboratory to make it hatch!
goh.mission: Hello!  Do you have any item related to a Legendary Pokémon? If so, show me, and I will give you the necessary tools to summon them!
entity.serp:pc_description.name: ¡welcome to Poké Mart online!
entity.serp:rotomarket_buy.name: ¡Hi-roto! Did you bring something for me??
entity.serp:rotomarket_potions.name: ¡Hi-roto! Do you want some Consumable??
entity.serp:rotomarket_pokeballs.name: ¡Hi-roto! Do you want to buy Pokéballs??
entity.serp:rotomarket_stuff.name: ¡Hi-roto! Would you like some item??
entity.serp:rotomarket_suits.name: ¡Hi-roto! Will you buy any clothes??
entity.pokedrock.pilot.name: Let me see, what do you have for me today?
